Sentencas: This article describes results of a recent study of SOFC (Solid Oxide Fuel Cell) material properties using a numerical tool.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: The created model was validated against experimental data collected for two different solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: With focus on ionic and electronic conductivities, temperature influence was investigated.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: Results are presented, compared with available data, and discussed.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: Model of a micro-CHP (Combined Heat and Power) unit based on a SOFC stack was used for evaluation of system performance with different cells.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: On-site generated bio-syngas was considered as a fuel fed for the unit.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: The overall system efficiency was analyzed using an Aspen HYSYS modeling environment.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: Properties of two generic electrolyte materials were implemented in the models for evaluation of a co-generative unit operation.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: Electrical and overall efficiencies of systems based on those cells were compared and differences were observed.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: Micro-scale power units with fuel cells are a promising technology for highly efficient distributed cogeneration.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling

Sentencas: As it was concluded, selection of a proper cell is crucial to assure high system efficiency.
Titulo: Investigation of SOFC material properties for plant-level modeling
